entry.title: [FF] So who has watched the first episode of Nathan Fielder's new HBO show The Rehear
entry.content: So who has watched the first episode of Nathan Fielder's new HBO show The Rehearsal? If you haven't, go watch it. Don't read up on it, don't even watch a trailer, go in blind and watch it. If you are prone to overthinking things - aka a motter - I can almost guarantee you will like it. It is amazing. Like all my favourite things, it is both really smart and beyond idiotic. I want to try to keep this spoiler free so I will be a little circumspect - do you think he confessed at the end? Would you?
